text:
*ContactMonkey is hiring a Content Writer* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

If youâ€™re a creative writer who is not afraid of change, willing to try new things, and work with a test-and-learn approach to content creation and SEO, we want to hear from you.
- Phenomenal writing skills and the ability to write in a fun, engaging, and cheeky tone of voice to engage our audience and drive conversions
- Create a diverse library of content, including blog posts, website copy,, ebooks, case studies, and reports
- Write at least two long-form, SEO optimized blog posts per week
- Work with the existing team to execute our content marketing strategy

Remote for now but we're Toronto based, when we do open up the office again we'll be looking to having a hybrid office with a mix of in office and remote. We want to hire the best talent so if you're not based in Toronto please still apply as we're also open to fully remote for the right person! 


*Learn more and apply here:* <https://www.contactmonkey.com/jobs/content-writer>
